[Home](./index.md) &gt; [blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [icons](./blockly.icons.md)

## icons namespace

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [CommentIcon](./blockly.icons.commenticon.md) | An icon which allows the user to add comment text to a block. |
|  [IconType](./blockly.icons.icontype.md) | Defines the type of an icon, so that it can be retrieved from block.getIcon |
|  [MutatorIcon](./blockly.icons.mutatoricon.md) | <p>An icon that allows the user to change the shape of the block.</p><p>For example, it could be used to add additional fields or inputs to the block.</p> |
|  [WarningIcon](./blockly.icons.warningicon.md) | <p>An icon that warns the user that something is wrong with their block.</p><p>For example, this could be used to warn them about incorrect field values, or incorrect placement of the block (putting it somewhere it doesn't belong).</p> |

## Abstract Classes

|  Abstract Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Icon](./blockly.icons.icon.md) | The abstract icon class. Icons are visual elements that live in the top-start corner of the block. Usually they provide more "meta" information about a block (such as warnings or comments) as opposed to fields, which provide "actual" information, related to how a block functions. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [CommentState](./blockly.icons.commentstate.md) | The save state format for a comment icon. |
